author: ajsutton
content: Clique gets stuck from time to time. It's a known issue where the validators can evenly split and then no one can propose.

author: ajsutton
content:
Typically one of the geth or nethermind validators winds up being resync'd and hopefully it picks the other side of the fork this time and can then propose and the chain keeps going.  Besu is deterministic in which block it will pick in case of equal total difficulty (part of a proposal to fix this in clique that hasn't been widely adopted) so resyncing a besu node won't help. 
The other option is to bring a validator that's been offline back online but not sure if we have any of those at the moment.
